title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

MONDAY OCTOBER 14, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 **

Today looks rather stressful Rams, as something – or someone – irritates you and tests your limited patience. So resist the temptation to play pointless power games with those around you.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 **

Avoid being too black and white about issues today! There are many shades of grey at the moment, as you negotiate and navigate your way through a changing personal or professional landscape.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

Work, wellbeing, exercise, pets, health and helping others are all favoured today. But avoid being impulsive about a friendship issue that will take plenty of time, tact and patience to resolve.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Today’s planetary patterns favour friendships, romance, sport, hobbies and serious conversations. But – with Saturn and Pluto activating your relationship zone - it won’t all be smooth sailing!

LEO July 24-Aug 23 **

Being a bossy Lion – or a demanding Diva - will get you nowhere fast today. In order for your relationships to blossom, you need to give others plenty of personal space and room to shine.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Companionship and conversation are highlighted, as you reminisce with loved ones about the good times. You’re also in the mood to watch a movie, listen to music or visit an art gallery.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Expect a good day, especially if you plan carefully. If you network, are flexible, and don’t assume you have all the answers, then pleasant and productive relations with others will follow.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 **

Today’s Sun/Pluto square boosts your temperamental streak and your Scorpio control-freak tendencies. You’ll find the more stubborn you are, the more challenging the day will be.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Don’t give in to the urge to splurge. The more disciplined you are with cash and credit, the better. Many Sagittarians are in the mood to research their ancestors and draw up their family tree.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 **

There is the potential for compulsive behaviour and power struggles today, especially with authority figures or work colleagues. So strive to be less demanding and much more consultative.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 **

When it comes to a personal issue or a family matter, you may have to ask some hard questions and take a firm stand. You won’t get far if you just escape into your own private world.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 **

Group activities or joint finances look problematic, as someone tries to take over. Your natural inclination is to procrastinate but, the more passive you are, the more stressful the day will be.

YOUR DAY

The Sun/Pluto square makes for a very intense day.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Expect some challenges over the coming year. If you approach them in a measured and composed way, then you’ll eventually taste success.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
